start.start-dialogue: Please go do my thing for me

steps.prompt-dialogue: Talk to my friend in that cool city over there.
steps.complete-dialogue: I'm going to need you to get a stick, a gold nugget, and an iron shovel. Then come back to me.

steps.incomplete-dialogue: You have not yet gotten me the goods I asked you to fetch. I need a stick, a gold nuget, and an iron shovel.
